description: With so many incredible uses for this cheesecloth, it will quickly become your favorite kitchen tool! High quality, food grade safe cheesecloth made of 100% natural unbleached cotton fibers and yarns can be used for cheese making, winemaking, straining stocks, custards and nut milk without worrying about chemicals seeping into your food. This soft and absorbent, 100% unbleached cotton cheesecloth has a 28x24 weave ideal for bundling herbs together and creating spice bags, steeping loose tea, straining seeds from berries, canning or squeezing seedless fruit without having to overlap multiple layers of cheesecloth to strain out the finest particles. Keep your holiday meats juicy and flavorful by wrapping a soaked cheesecloth around your meat to eliminate the need for basting or use it as a strainer to remove bones and fats for lump free gravy, soups and stews! Durable, washable and reusable, this all-purpose Grade 50 cheesecloth is ideal for household use and crafts, polishing, waxing, wiping, staining, or to be used as wedding decor, baby shower decor, custom gift wraps, holiday decorations, photography props and backdrops, and much more! Measures 45 square feet and can be cut to desired size to fit your needs and reduce waste.
